description: Query a list of incoming domain transfers.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: Index of the first entry to be returned
Max. number of entries to be returned

Depth of the list, may be one of the following: SELF: Command only returns transfers that belong to the executing user.  SUBUSER: Command only returns transfers that belong to the executing user's subusers.  ALL: Command returns transfers that belong to the executing user or to one of it's subusers.  The default value of this parameter is ALL
Filter for transfers that haven been initiated after the date specified there
Filter for transfers that haven been initiated before the date specified there
Parameter by which the output will be sorted.Must be one of the following:DOMAIN, DOMAINDESC, USER, USERDESC, CREATEDDATE, CREATEDDATEDESC
